ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.5_0: 82. The training rule on every year
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.2_0: At that time the nuns were giving full admission every year, and the nuns’ dwelling place did not have sufficient capacity.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.4_0: “How can the nuns give full admission every year, when the nuns’ dwelling place doesn’t have sufficient capacity?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.7_0: “How can the nuns give full admission every year?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun gives full admission every year, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.9_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.10_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.11_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.12_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.13_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.2_0: if she gives full admission every other year;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.5_0: The twelfth rule, the training rule on twelfthing, is finished.
